sentences.en: Chuck would lecture me, telling me to get a haircut.
sentences.cn: 查克就会数落我，让我去理一下发。

sentences.en: Fortune-telling is a very much debased art surrounded by superstition.
sentences.cn: 算命是一种非常低级的把戏，充满了迷信色彩。

sentences.en: He carried on telling a joke, laughing his head off.
sentences.cn: 他继续讲笑话，自己笑得前仰后合。

sentences.en: He was telling his tales of conquest in clubland.
sentences.cn: 当时他正在大讲特讲自己在夜总会的征服史。

sentences.en: Herbert sat quietly through the telling of this saga.
sentences.cn: 在聆听这个长篇传奇故事时，赫伯特自始至终安静地坐着。

sentences.en: I don't mind telling you I was absolutely terrified.
I got a severe telling off for not phoning him.
sentences.cn: 我因为没给他打电话，被狠狠训斥了一顿。

sentences.en: I have been scrupulous about telling them the dangers.
sentences.cn: 我已经本着良心将危险告知他们。

sentences.en: I heard David yelling and telling them to get back.
sentences.cn: 我听到戴维高声喊叫着要他们回来。

sentences.en: Leaflets have been air dropped telling people to leave certain areas.
sentences.cn: 传单被空投下来，要求人们离开某些地区。

sentences.en: Pain is the body's way of telling us that something is wrong.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是身体在告诉我们有地方出问题了。

sentences.en: There'dbe no telling how John would react to such news as this.
sentences.cn: 还不知道约翰听到这样的消息会作何反应。

sentences.en: There's no telling how long the talks could drag on.
sentences.cn: 谁也说不准谈判还会拖多久。

sentences.en: There's no telling what diseases a person can get.
sentences.cn: 无法预知人会得什么病。

sentences.en: Tom wasted no time in telling me why he had come.
sentences.cn: 汤姆马上告诉了我他来的原因。

words.tran_cn: （美）出纳员；讲述者；讲故事者；计票员

trans.tran_cn: 有效的，显著的，生动的，说明问题的
trans.tran_en: having a great or important effect

trans.tran_cn: 讲述( tell的现在分词)，告诉
